config.script:
import time
	
	# Refresh user table binding and rotate refresh icon.
	self.view.refreshBinding('custom.Data')
	self.rotateIcon()

customMethods.name: rotateIcon
customMethods.script:
import time
	
	# Rotate icon 360 degrees.
	for degree in range(0,361, 10):
		self.props.style.transform = 'rotate(' + str(degree) + 'deg)'
		time.sleep(0.0278)
